summary: VEHICLE AIRBAG LIGHTS ON STARTUP STAYED ON. DEALER SAID OK TO DERIVE EVEN THOUGH APP SAID AIRBAG A MAY NOT DEPLOY. ISSUE SOUNDS LIKE THE SAME ISSUE AS 2018 RAMS. LESS THAN A MONTH LATER THE CRUISE CONTROL WOULD SPEED UP OR TURN OFF WHILE ENGAGED. WHEN ALL OF SUDDEN IT STOOPED WORKING. DISABLED..THIS IS A NECESSARY FEATURE ON A LONGER TRIP. LASTLY ABOUT 3 WEEKS LAYER WHEN I NEEDED THE HORN, IT TOO STOPPED WORKING. 2 SAFETY ISSUES AND ITS OK TO DRIVE.  *TR
